A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The last Jedi is basically Director Rian Johnson punching everything that is Star wars square in the face. Then throwing it the middle finger\, then kicking it to the ground and finally taking a almighty c**p all over it.

He then wraps up the remains with beautiful fight scenes and space battles\, with sprinklings of social justice and feminist ideology to keep Kathleen Kennedy and the feminists happy. 

Worst Star wars ever.
